subject: Order #SSN2549 – Missing Items
description_text:
Order #SSN2549 – Missing Items


Hi,


I recently ordered the Pro X Ultra pedals with haptic feedback and a pedal plate. The order was split into two shipments.


  *   The first delivery (last week) included the Pro X Ultra pedals with the black and carbon fibre pedal plate.
  *   I assumed the second delivery would contain the haptic vibration parts (Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motors) for all three pedals.



However, today I received only another pedal plate, this time in silver. I am still missing the three Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motors that I ordered, and we are now past the original delivery timeframe.


Could you please update me on the status of the missing items and confirm when I can expect them?


Thank you,

Fraser o'brien




Sent from Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并至工单 3798。
